word:
I will help Nellie one hundred dollars if you will do the same. Two hundred dollars would be a great blessing to her 
                                                                           327
just now. Will you do this for Christ's sake? Will you encourage others to help her to get a start in life? It would be far better to do this than to wait and let Nellie be worn out with anxiety and care and fall in the struggle, leaving her children helpless, motherless, to be cared for by others.
